welcomePagesText.firstPageUnderText: Forget about the form of paper, all knowledge is in one app.
welcomePagesText.secondPageUnderText: Always keep in touch with your tutor and friend. Let's get connected.
welcomePagesText.thirdPageUnderText: Anywhere, anytime. The time is at your discretion, so study whenever you want.

signInLogIn.loginAdvice: Or use your email account login
